remarks:
Ordering property of addition on reals.  Axiom 20 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  Note:  The more general version for extended reals is ~ axltadd .  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-pre-ltadd .  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.) 

---

 Ordering property of addition on reals.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-pre-ltadd . (Contributed by NM, 11-May-1996.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: axpre-ltadd $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( A <RR B -> ( C + A ) <RR ( C + B ) ) ) $.
